document.full_text: world number two roger federer and australian open champion novak djokovic each stormed into the fourth round of the indian wells atp tournament with lop-sided victories on tuesday.
document.title: federer and djokovic steamroll into fourth round
lines_and_colors: world number two roger federer and australian open champion novak djokovic each stormed into the fourth round of the indian wells atp tournament with lop-sided victories on tuesday.
